predicate.note: Frames file for 'characterize' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'describe'.

roleset.name: assign a label or attribute

example.name: typical transitive
example.text: William R. Laidig, Nekoosa's chairman, chief executive officer and president, characterized the $58-a-share bid as ``uninvited.''
example.arg: William R. Laidig, Nekoosa's chairman, chief executive officer and president,

example.name: lacking attribute
example.text: Anheuser noted that ``beer industry sales volume in 1989 is following the trend that has characterized the last half of the '80s.

roleset.note: Latter could be considered a different roleset/sense.
